meanings.definition: The surgical transplantation of the cornea.
meanings.sent1: The doctor performed keratoplasties on patients with damaged corneas.
meanings.sent2: After the keratoplasties, the patients' vision improved significantly.
meanings.sent3: During the surgery, the corneas did a little dance as they received their keratoplasties.
meanings.sent4: The keratoplasties were like giving the corneas a new lease on life.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights in the operating room illuminated the delicate keratoplasties.
